results.title: P Storm
results.overview: William Luk, goes undercover as a prisoner to investigate correctional officers who are receiving bribes.

results.title: The Lion King
results.overview: Simba idolises his father, King Mufasa, and takes to heart his own royal destiny. But not everyone in the kingdom celebrates the new cub's arrival. Scar, Mufasa's brother—and former heir to the throne—has plans of his own. The battle for Pride Rock is ravaged with betrayal, tragedy and drama, ultimately resulting in Simba's exile. With help from a curious pair of newfound friends, Simba will have to figure out how to grow up and take back what is rightfully his.

results.title: 売春婦はアルファベットを書く
results.original_title: 売春婦はアルファベットを書く
results.overview: Visionary director Satoru Kurogawa returns to the world of animation with his feature-length debut

results.title: Lying and Stealing
results.overview: Hoping to leave his criminal lifestyle behind him, a successful art thief teams up with a sexy con woman to pull off the ultimate heist and set himself free.

results.title: Vennila Kabaddi Kuzhu 2
results.overview: Vennila Kabaddi Kuzhu 2 is an upcoming Indian Tamil action sports drama film directed by Selva Sekaran. A sequel to Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu (2009), the film is written by the original's director Suseenthiran and features Vikranth and Arthana in the lead roles.

results.title: Point Blank
results.overview: A nurse is forced to spring a wounded murder suspect from the hospital when the man’s brother kidnaps his pregnant wife and wants to make a trade.

results.title: Summer Night
results.overview: In a small town, a young, tight-knit group of friends fall in and out of love over the course of one intoxicating, music-filled summer night.

results.title: Super 30
results.overview: Based on life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

results.title: Pokémon: Mewtwo Strikes Back Evolution
results.original_title: 劇場版ポケットモンスター ミュウツーの逆襲 EVOLUTION

results.title: I Got the Hook Up 2
results.overview: After best friends Black and Blue's restaurant is shut down, Black needs to find some cash -- fast. He thinks his luck has turned when Blue's son, Fatboy, and his best friend, Spyda,, bring him a stash of stolen cellphones, and Black decides to sell them on the streets. There's only one problem: The boxes with the phones also contain the Colombian cartel's stash of Molly, which Spyda decides to sell.

results.title: The Lover's Manifesto or A Thesis on the Proceedings or Non-Proceedings of Love in Student Government
results.original_title: The Lover's Manifesto or A Thesis on the Proceedings or Non-Proceedings of Love in Student Government
results.overview: Anarchist Sam Wiley and President of Student Government Rachel Morgan are forced to reexamine their political beliefs in order to make their relationship work.

results.title: Armstrong
results.overview: Dramatic, moving and deeply human, ARMSTRONG offers the definitive life story of Neil Armstrong: from his childhood in Ohio to his first steps on the Moon, and beyond.

results.title: Saving Zoë
results.overview: Echo must deal with the regular dramas of high school, in addition to grappling with the murder of her older sister, Zoë. But when Echo receives a diary from Zoë's boyfriend, she begins to untangle the secret life her sister lived.

results.title: Rescue
results.overview: A religious country, constitutional monarchy. The highest political leader is the prime minister and the religious leader is the king of law. Military power and diplomatic rights are in the hands of the Prime Minister, but the spiritual leader most loved by the people is the King of Law. For forty years or more, the King has become the common existence of totems in the hearts of the people. Once the government implements measures that are not conducive to the people, the King will exert pressure on the government on behalf of the people. Although he does not have real power, he will grasp the people's hearts. Even the highest commander of the army is the King of law, strong supporters. From the perspective of the Prime Minister, he loves and hates the King of Law. For the sake of national economic development, his actual actions will always be obstructed by the King.

results.title: The Town With Many Faces
results.overview: A mysterious entity takes advantage of a house inhabitted by college boys in a quiet Canadian town.

results.title: Aruvam
results.overview: Aruvam is an upcoming Indian Tamil-language comedy horror film written and directed by Sai Sekhar.
